title: [Self-Directed] Deep Learning-Based Approach for Single-Image Rain Removal

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of machine learning and image processing concepts
context.additional_context: Requires designing smartphone-centered learning activities in limited-technology environments, with continuous feedback through formative assessment.

learning_goals: One can describe the core challenges of rain removal models (rain/background separation, texture preservation)
One can analyze rain patterns and detail loss regions using a dual-stream pipeline architecture
One can propose implementation strategies for mobile-friendly rain removal models in resource-constrained environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
